caption.p: Effect of different concentrations of CEO on mycelial growth (A) and spore germination (B) of C. acutatum. Values are the averages of the replicates for all the analyses. Error bars are ±SD of the means. In some cases the error bar is obscured by the symbol. Columns with different letters at each time point indicate significant differences according to Duncan’s multiple range tests at p < 0.05.
